book-store.description: Calculate lowest price for shopping basket only containing books from a single series

cases.description: A basket containing only a single book is charged full price.

description: A basket containing only two of the same book is most inexpensively
grouped as two, one book, groups.

cases.description: No charge to carry around an empty basket.
A basket containing just two different books is the least expensive as a single group.
A basket of three different books is the least expensive as a single group.
A basket of four different books is the least expensive as a single group.
A basket of five different books is the least expensive as a single group.

description: For a basket containing eight books consisting of a pair each of the first three books
plus one copy each of the last two books, it is the least expensive if the first four books
are in one group and the first three books plus the fifth book are in a second group.
For a basket containing nine books consisting of a pair each of the first four books
plus one of the last book, it is the least expensive if the first five books
are in one group and the first four books are in a second group.
For a basket containing ten books consisting of two copies of each book
in the series, it is the least expensive if the books
are split into two groups, each group consisting of one copy of each book.
For a basket containing eleven books consisting of three copies of the first book plus
two each of the remaining four books in the series, it is the least expensive if the
books are grouped into three groups.  The first two groups would each contain one copy
of the five books in the series.  The third group would consist of only the first book.
For a basket containing twelve books consisting of three copies of the first two books, plus
two each of the remaining three books in the series, it is the least expensive if the
books are grouped into three groups.  The first two groups would each contain one copy
of the five books in the series.  The third group would consist of one copy each of the first
second books.
